Class Player

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Player
extends MovingImage
    Represents a player entity that can interact with other players
    Author:
    Richard Qin 5/4/18
    See Also:
